config-version.name: Configuration version
config-version.description: The version of the configuration file

setup-done.name: Setup done
setup-done.description: If the guild initial setup is done

prefixes.name: Prefixes
prefixes.description: The alternative prefixes for the bot

success.name: Success embed color
success.description: The color of the success embeds

error.name: Error embed color
error.description: The color of the error embeds

warning.name: Warning embed color
warning.description: The color of the warning embeds

main.name: Main embed color
main.description: The color of the main embeds

returnErrorOnCommandError.name: Return error on command error
returnErrorOnCommandError.description: Enable for the bot to return an error when commands error.

returnErrorOnPermissionDenied.name: Return error on permission deny
returnErrorOnPermissionDenied.description: Enable for the bot to return an error when commands is denied.

returnErrorOnUnknownCommand.name: Return error on unknown command
returnErrorOnUnknownCommand.description: Enable for the bot to return an error when an unknown command is tried. (basically any message starting with one of the prefixes)

returnErrorOnCommandCooldown.name: Return error on command cooldown
returnErrorOnCommandCooldown.description: Enable for the bot to return an error on command cooldown.

inChannel.name: Log command execution in channel
inChannel.description: Should we log the command execution in the logging channel?

channel.name: Command execution logging channel
channel.description: What is the command execution logging channel?

logFailed.name: Log failed command execution in channel
logFailed.description: Should we log the failed command execution in the logging channel?

inChannel.name: Log moderation actions in channel
inChannel.description: Should we log the moderation actions in the logging channel?

channel.name: Moderation logging channel
channel.description: What is the moderation logging channel?

inChannel.name: Log moderation actions in channel
inChannel.description: Should we log the moderation actions in the logging channel?

channel.name: Auto moderation logging channel
channel.description: What is the auto moderation logging channel?
